info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 8:38PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HARDING AND NORTHWESTERN PERKINS COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM MDT... At 838 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Ludlow, or 20 miles northeast of Buffalo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ralph around 845 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lodgepole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
